PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-08122024-06-21FIN
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Development Investment Corporation - share acquisition and sale
PrecisOrder authorizing a wholly-owned subsidiary of Canada Development Investment Corporation (CDEV) to (1) acquire shares in TELESAT LEO Inc.; and (2) sell or otherwise dispose of or lease all or substantially all of its assets.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing a wholly-owned subsidiary of Canada Development Investment Corporation (CDEV) to (1) acquire shares in TELESAT LEO Inc.; and (2) sell or otherwise dispose of or lease all or substantially all of its assets.
